Interface MancalaBoardLayout

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StyleOne, StyleTwo

    public interface MancalaBoardLayout
    Copyright (C) Victory Chang. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED. An interface that represents a layout for the Mancala board.

                                double y)
        Returns a Shape for a Stone. The shape’s top left corner is at the given x and y coordinates.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the Shape’s top left corner
        y - the y-coordinate of the Shape’s top left corner
        Returns:
        a Shape who’s top left corner is at the given x and y coordinates
